tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE model_predictions (
    prediction_id INT,
    model_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    predicted_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES forecasting_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE time_series_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE model_parameters (
    model_id UUID,
    parameter_name VARCHAR,
    parameter_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id, parameter_name)
)

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    model_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    feature_1 FLOAT,
    feature_2 FLOAT,
    feature_3 FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE forecast_results (
    model_id UUID,
    forecast_date DATE,
    forecast_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id, forecast_date)
)

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
    model_id UUID,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    metric_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id, evaluation_date, metric_name)
)
